title: The Bible Says What in Numbers 5:11-31? | Unapologetic Show
itunes:title: The Bible Says What in Numbers 5:11-31? | Unapologetic Show
description: There are several passages in scripture that, no matter how long you have been walking with the Lord you may not have focused on. They aren't one's likely to be hung on your bathroom wall or on an inspiration coffee cup. Bobby and Tim wanted to look at several of these verses and give you tools to help you understand them. These often come up in conversations with non-believers as a 'gotcha' for Christians. If you have a verse you would like us to tackle; please leave it in the comments under this video on YouTube. Take the OMA Mental Health Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/mhcc Take the OMA Apologetics Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/acc https://www.patreon.com/oneminuteapologist
